Qirui Yang, Runyu Jin, Ming Zhao
Arizona State University
http://visa.lab.asu.edu
Resource Management on Edge and IoT
Limited on-device storage o Limited I/O performance o Limited capacity o Limited endurance
Deduplication can o Eliminate redundant I/Os improve performance o Reduce flash writes improve endurance o Remove redundant data improve utilization
But o Is there enough data duplication in device workloads? o How to exploit it using limited resources on the device?
SmartDedupA Smart Deduplication Solution for Smart Devices
Cohesively designed in-memory and on-disk fingerprint stores o On-disk store complements the small in-memory store
Synergistically integrated in-line and out-of-line deduplication o Out-of-line deduplicates data skipped by in-line
Adaptive deduplication according to resource and battery availability o Dynamically enabled/disabled, dynamic processing rate
